#!/bin/bash
# This file was generated via DeepL machine translation from en
# Filename: <lng>/lang.txt - coded in utf-8
# Language variables for cgi pages in the user language
# --------------------------------------------------------------
displaynameINFO="Autorun"
descriptionINFO="Führt ein Skript auf einem externen Laufwerk (USB / eSATA) aus, wenn es an die Disk Station angeschlossen ist."
LoginRequired="Anmeldung erforderlich"
PleaseLogin="Bitte loggen Sie sich zuerst als Administrator ein, bevor Sie diese Webseite benutzen"
settingsTitle="Aktuelle $app_name Einstellungen:"
logTitleExec="Protokoll der Aktionen (Geräteanbindung, Skriptausführung und Geräteauswurf)"
logTitleDetail="Protokoll der Aktivitäten. Die aktuelle Protokollstufe ist '$LOGLEVEL'."
settingFingerprint="The with root access executed script is a security risk, especially if it's configured with location on the external storage. Execution can be restricted to scripts matching previously registered SHA256 checksum.<br>0: No restriction. Previously registered checksums are preserved.<br>1: If there are previously registered checksums, they are deleted. The 1st script with it's checksum is registered as allowed checksum.<br>2: All scripts are allowed and there checksums are registered.<br>3: Only scripts with previously registered checksums are allowed."
settingScript="Variant a: The script is located in the root directory of the external storage device and set as executable for the user 'root'. Given is the pure script name without any path or slash.<br>Variant b: The script is given with it's full path and is located on the NAS.<br>It gets the mount point of the device (e.g. /volumeUSB1/usbshare/) as the first parameter (\$1) and the device partition (e.g. usb1p1) as the second (\$2). It needs to be executable for 'root'. It's started with an empty environment. So as no PATH is set. You have to use for each command the full path (e.g. /bin/echo "...") or to set PATH."
settingScriptAfter="If the script exits with the exit code 100, then autorun will eject that storage device and afterwards call this 2nd script. This is optional. Typical usage is to power down an HDD with external supply via a smart power adapter."
settingTries="The time (in seconds) how long autorun should search for a mounted drive. Increase this value when you get the \"unable to find mount point\" error."
settingWait="An additional wait time (in secords) after mounting is detected before starting the script. In some cases a few seconds delay is required for proper drive access."
settingBeep="If set to 'true', there is a short beep when a script is found. And a tripple long beep in case of an error."
settingLedStatus="The status LED can be used to show the script status.<br>0: The status LED is used by this package.<br>1: 1: Green while running, green flashing during eject, OFF if finished with 0 or 100, orange flashing for other results or failed eject<br/>2: Green flashing while script is running or ejecting, green if finished with 0 or 100, orange flashing for other results or failed eject<br/>3: Green while script is running and during eject, OFF when finished, orange flashing if ejection failed."
settingLedCopy="The status LED can also be used to show the script status.<br>0: The copy LED is used by this package.<br>1: ON while running or ejecting, OFF afterwards<br/>2: Flashing while running or ejecting, OFF afterwards<br/>3: ON while running or ejecting, afterwards OFF (0/100) or flashing (other codes)<br/>4: Flashing while running or ejecting, afterwards OFF or flashing (other codes or ejection failing)<br/>5: Flashing while running or ejection, afterwards OFF (0/100) or ON (other codes or ejectionFail)"
settingNoDsmMessageReturnCodes="Normally there is a DSM desktop message generated after your script is finished. The message contains the return code of your script and the remaining free space on the storage device. If your script exits with one of the codes given here, then no such message is generated. A entry in the logfile of the package is still generated."
ledResetHint="Depending on the LED settings, the LEDs on the device may indicate an error condition after the script ends. With the command <span style=\"font-family:'Courier New'\" translate='no'>echo \8 \ 4 \B> /dev/ttyS1</span>, executed as 'root', the normal state can be restored. You may create a scheduled task in the control panel for a custom script for the root user with the run command <span style=\"font-family:'Courier New'\" translate='no'>echo \8 \ 4 \B> /dev/ttyS1</span> (8: Status LED green, 4: Power LED on, B: Copy LED off). And run that if it's necessary to reset the LEDs."
settingEjectTimeout="If in case of exit code 100 the externald drive cannot be ejected (as it's busy), this gives the timeout in seconds before terminating ejection tries with error."
settingLogMaxLines="To avoid, that too much space is occupied by the logfiles, the elder half of the files is deleted if the line count has reached the given number."
settingLogVerbose="Several detail levels are available for writing messages to the debug log file: 1 ... 8. The higher the value the more details."
settingNotifyUsers="The package generates desktop notifications, which are shown to a configurable user or user group. A name strating with '@' is a group name."
settingHeadlineFingerprints="Actually registered SHA256 checksums (fingerprints) of script files:"
runInstallationAgain="Sie können die Installation erneut ausführen, um die Einstellungen zu ändern!"
ledCtrlHint="Wenn die LEDs immer noch einen Fehler anzeigen, können Sie sie hier zurücksetzen:"
btnCopyLedOff="Kopier-LED aus"
btnStatusLedGreen="Status-LED grün"
btnStatusLedOff="Status-LED aus"
btnDelLog="Diese Protokolldatei löschen"
btnRefresh="Seite aktualisieren"
btnShowDetailLog="Detaillierte Debug-Protokolldatei anzeigen"
btnShowSimpleLog="Einfaches Protokoll anzeigen"
hrefLog="Protokoll der Aktionen"
btnShowLicence="Lizenz"
btnShowSettings="Einstellungen anzeigen"
btnDownload="Herunterladen ..."
execLogNA="Logdatei nicht gefunden oder leer. War nach dem Start dieses Pakets bereits ein Speichermedium mit einer Skriptdatei im Stammverzeichnis angeschlossen?"
HASH_DELETION="<b>Previous registered hashes are all deleted now.</b> "
copyPriviledge="Sie können den benötigten Befehl <input type='text' size='80' value='sudo cp /var/packages/$SYNOPKG_PKGNAME/conf/privilege.root /var/packages/$SYNOPKG_PKGNAME/conf/privilege'> über SSH <strong>jetzt ausführen!</strong> Nach 'OK' können Sie dann das Paket mit 'Run' starten."
scriptNA="Fehler: Das Skript '$f' konnte nicht gefunden werden!"
scriptNAcase="Seltsam: Datei mit anderer Groß-Kleinschreibung gefunden!"
setupCorrection="Sie müssen die Installation möglicherweise nochmals ausführen um die Einstellung zu korrigieren!"
scriptNexec="Fehler: Das Skript '$f' ist nicht ausführbar!"
wrongLineBreakWin="Fehler: Das Skript '$f', das ausgeführt werden soll, verwendet den falschen Zeilenumbruch CR/LF (Windows). Bitte verwenden Sie einen geeigneten Editor (Linux oder Windows Notepad  , PSPad, ...), um ihn in LF (UNIX) zu ändern!"
wrongCodePage="Fehler: Das Skript '$f', das ausgeführt werden soll, verwendet die falsche Kodierung (Windows ISO-8859). Bitte verwenden Sie einen geeigneten Editor (Linux oder Windows Notepad  , PSPad, ...), um es in UTF-8 zu ändern!"
wrongLineBreakMac="Fehler: Das Skript '$f', das ausgeführt werden soll, verwendet den falschen Zeilenumbruch CR (MAC). Bitte verwenden Sie einen geeigneten Editor, um ihn in LF (UNIX) zu ändern!"
notifyUserError="Das Benutzerkonto '$notyfyUsers' für Desktop-Nachrichten existiert nicht! Daher wird der falsche Eintrag durch die Gruppe '@users' ersetzt. Führen Sie die Installation erneut aus, um einen anderen Wert einzugeben!"
notifyGroupError="Die Benutzergruppe '$notyfyUsers' für Desktop-Nachrichten existiert nicht! Daher wird der falsche Eintrag durch '@users' ersetzt. Führen Sie die Installation erneut aus, um einen anderen Wert einzugeben!"

txtAlertOnlyAdmin="Der Zugriff ist nur für Mitglieder der Gruppe \"Administratoren\" erlaubt."
txtLanguageSource="Die Sprache dieser Seite wurde entsprechend den regionalen Einstellungen Ihres Webbrowsers ausgewählt."
preinstDsmVersError="Diese Paketversion kann nur in DSM ${osMin} und höher verwendet werden! Frühere Paketversionen können in Ihrer DSM-Version möglich sein, siehe <a target='_blank' rel='noopener noreferrer' href='https://github.com/reidemei/synology-autorun#install'>https://github.com/reidemei/synology-autorun#install</a>"
